mapper.select: SELECT UR.IS_FAV, W.WS_ID, W.WS_NAME, W.WS_ISIMAGE, R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_TYPE from GC_USER_ROLE UR INNER JOIN GC_USER U ON (U.user_id = UR.user_id) INNER JOIN GC_ROLE R ON (R.role_id = UR.role_id) INNER JOIN GC_WS W ON(W.WS_ID = UR.WS_ID) WHERE UR.USER_ID=#{user_id}

SELECT w.ws_id, w.ws_name, n.noti_type, n.noti_desc, n.noti_time, n.noti_checked FROM gc_noti n JOIN gc_ws w ON w.ws_id = n.ws_id JOIN gc_noti_user nu ON nu.noti_id = n.noti_id WHERE nu.user_id= #{user_id}
select user_id from gc_user_role where ws_id = #{ws_id}
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'WS_SEQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GC_WS (ws_id, ws_name, ws_isimage) VALUES(#{ws_id}, #{ws_name}, #{ws_isImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE gc_user_role WHERE ws_id = #{ws_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
